ur_rna.Utilities.swing

Class JActionLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLabel
            • ur_rna.Utilities.swing.JActionLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.SwingConstants

    public class JActionLabel
extends javax.swing.JLabel
    A label that reacts to clicks by calling ActionListener.actionPerformed(ActionEvent) or ActionListener.actionPerformed(ActionEvent) with a custom actionCommand. This can be useful for links etc.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public boolean hasClickAction()
        Returns true if some action is performed on click. I.e. if any ActionListeners are registered or if an Action or Link has been set.
